name: Delmonico
description:
WARNING- this game contains themes that can be disturbing for some, related to violence and religion.

Game by Viktor R. aka dallas.

A GBStudio 1Bit game that can be downloaded and played at an GBC emulator, real hardware, or at this web page.

-LORE

The prophecy stated that a tainted warrior would rise, undertake the pilgrimage to the land of ancient kings, and at last, defeat Wilshire, the impenitent lord of ambition.

-CONTROLS

Z- jump

X- attack

ARROW KEYS- walk

Z + X- throw crosses

-FEATURES

5 chapters

5 different areas

6 bosses

Secrets and 3 different endings 

ps: I will still add a little guide book for the game

If you wanna know more about the games mechanics or even about the secrets and endings hit me up at discord "da77as#4910"
